message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire a highly valuable product. Given its significance and the benefits it offers, I believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering its true worth and your potential benefit from it, I am offering you the chance to purchase this product for $9500. This price reflects a fair compromise between its intrinsic value and your perceived value, ensuring both parties benefit. I trust you'll find this offer compelling and look forward to your positive response.
